keywords: ['raaga music', 'male voice', 'sound of bells', 'synth wind sounds', 'no percussion', 'slow tempo', 'meditation song', 'religious changing song']
caption: This raaga music features a male singer. This is accompanied by twinkling sounds made by bells at different frequencies. There is a synth playing a wind-like sound in the background. There are no other instruments in this song. This song has a religious chanting feel. This song can be played for a meditation session. The mood of this song is peaceful.
